import { useRef } from "react"; import ScriptEditorSkeleton from "../ScriptEditorSkeleton"; import DetailedAnalytics from "../DetailedAnalytics"; import { cleanScript } from "../helpers/cleanScript"; import { Upload, Scissors, Volume2, FileText, Wand2, Plus, X, Edit3, Sparkles, ChevronLeft, ChevronRight, Zap, Brain, Mic, Users, Eye, Heart, Clock, Star, Target, } from "lucide-react"; const ContentStudio = ({ isLeftPanelCollapsed, setIsLeftPanelCollapsed, contentType, setContentType, topic, setTopic, keyPoints, setKeyPoints, duration, setDuration, script, setScript, isGeneratingKeyPoints, isGeneratingScript, isExtendingScript, isAuthenticated, audioMethod, setAudioMethod, recordedAudio, setShowTeleprompter, setShowAudioEditor, audioUrl, assessment, assessmentLoading, handleTextSelection, generateKeyPoints, generateScript, extendScript, generateAudio, apiClient, }) => { const scriptRef = useRef(null); const addKeyPoint = () => { if (keyPoints.length < 10) { setKeyPoints([...keyPoints, ""]); } }; const updateKeyPoint = (index, value) => { const newKeyPoints = [...keyPoints]; newKeyPoints[index] = value; setKeyPoints(newKeyPoints); }; const removeKeyPoint = (index) => { const newKeyPoints = keyPoints.filter((_, i) => i !== index); setKeyPoints(newKeyPoints.length > 0 ? newKeyPoints : [""]); }; const contentTypes = [ { id: "lifestyle", name: "Lifestyle", icon: Heart, color: "slate" }, { id: "gaming", name: "Gaming", icon: Target, color: "blue" }, { id: "tech", name: "Technology", icon: Zap, color: "indigo" }, { id: "education", name: "Education", icon: Brain, color: "blue" }, { id: "entertainment", name: "Entertainment", icon: Star, color: "slate" }, ]; return (
